title: Shre.IN (Share Text and Files)
desc:
Users can instantly share documents, images, videos, and othermaterials with family, friends, and colleagues.
Shre.in is an innovative online platform that allows users to easilyshare text and files with others. With just a few clicks, users caninstantly share documents, images, videos, and other materials withfamily, friends, and colleagues. Shre.in provides an intuitive, user-friendly interface that helps users quickly and easily upload theircontent and share it with others.
tech:
Socket.IO used for realtime communication
with client and server

title: PrintPass (Printing Bank Passbook)
desc:
User can print SBI first page of booklet passbook
I made this website just to showcase my skills. This is not a production website.
tech: User Management System with Authentication and Authrization

title: Shopping Buds (Make Shopping List)
desc: "Shopping Buds" is an online platform that makes shopping easierand more organized. With this website, users can create lists for theirshopping needs and manage them with ease. Users can add items totheir lists, delete existing lists, and mark items as done or undone.This makes it the perfect solution for creating and keeping track ofwishlists for shopping.
